about.title: My Journey
about.description: Discover my academic and professional journey, from my engineering studies to my current expertise in software development and architecture.

prepIntegree.title: Integrated Preparatory School
prepIntegree.description: Beginning of my engineering studies at Polytech Nice with solid training in mathematics, physics and computer science.

cycleIngenieur.title: Computer Engineering Cycle
cycleIngenieur.description: Specialization in computer science with learning programming languages, algorithms and software architecture.

challengeJeunePousse.title: Challenge Jeunes Pousses Victory
challengeJeunePousse.description: Recognition of innovation and entrepreneurship with a victory in the Challenge Jeunes Pousses. Ecological project for large-scale implementation of digital receipts.

stageAccenture.title: Software Engineer Internship - Accenture
stageAccenture.description: First professional experience as a software engineer. Development of a booking platform for airlines.

stageOrange.title: Software Engineer Internship - Orange Business
stageOrange.description: Deepening technical skills. Development and design activities on an eco-design analysis platform for websites. Migration to AWS cloud.

diplome.title: Engineering Degree - Software Architecture Specialization
diplome.description: Obtaining an engineering degree with specialization in software architecture.

ingenieurOrange.title: Software Engineer - Orange Business
ingenieurOrange.description: Software engineer position for a network-oriented cloud platform. Development activities, continuous integration/deployment, and architecture design.

certificationAWS.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner Certification
certificationAWS.description: AWS certification demonstrating fundamental understanding of cloud services and best practices.

certificationDevOps.title: DevOps Foundation Certification
certificationDevOps.description: DevOps certification covering principles, practices and development and operations tools.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.educationDesc: Complete engineering education with specialization in software architecture.
skills.experienceDesc: Diverse professional experience in renowned companies in the technology sector.
skills.innovationDesc: Ability to innovate and undertake, recognized by professional awards and recognition.
